thread.title: Google releases Collections Feature on iOS
thread.title_full: Google releases Collections Feature on iOS

title: Google releases Collections Feature on iOS
text:
Google releases Collections Feature on iOS 
Technology Industry News.Net (ANI) : Tuesday 1st September, 2015 
Google has released Google Collections feature on iOS. 
According to the Verge, the update was announced in a blog post. Now the iOS users who still use Google can curate their feeds, filling them with images and conversations specific to their interests. 
Google Collections feature is basically like Pinterest. 
The feature first debuted this May with support for Android and the web. The users can create Collections on activities or have used them to organize and share photos. (ANI) More Technology Industry News
